Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery wine-jar, the fabric is grey in section and contains many small white inclusions, the interior is slightly grooved, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393452) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393452)
